::Rex::

Rex frowns, looking at Battera. Go outside? His mind instantly jumped to its 
ussual conclusion: Predacon threachery. Maybe Battera was just here to gather 
information on the Cybertronian Fire, and then run off back to her base... 
She didn't look the type to do that, but Predacons we ussually not what they 
seemed. In either case, accompanying her would ensure that she doesn't give 
information to the Predacons.

"Allright. I'll escort you," he says, nodding, "But we can't go too far from 
the ship."
